articles.title: Shift the overall look and feel by adding these wonderful touches to furniture in your home
articles.text: Ever been in a room and felt like something was missing? Perhaps it felt slightly bare and uninviting. I’ve got some simple tips to help you make any room feel complete.
articles.author: Michelle Appleton
